entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to a few rain showers or drizzle near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
